DOC.brief_summary: In case‐controlled , observational study , 24 subject participate 12‐hour blood collection single blood draw +24 hour . 12 men low testosterone level ( hypogonadism ) 12 men normal testosterone level . Blood sample draw every 2 hour later analyze total testosterone calculate free testosterone . The primary objective study assess degree diurnal variation men testosterone deficiency .
DOC.criteria: Men testosterone deficiency : Ability read , write , understand English Male sex birth Age great equal 18 Age less 46 Diagnosed testosterone deficiency prior visit 1 Screening testosterone concentration le 350 ng/dL Willing able comply study protocol Willing provide inform consent study No previous exposure exogenous T unless therapy least 4 week Men without testosterone deficiency : Ability read , write , understand English Male sex birth Age great equal 18 Age less 46 Never diagnose testosterone deficiency Screening testosterone concentration great 350 ng/dL Willing able comply study protocol Willing provide inform consent study No previous exposure exogenous T Previous exposure exogenous T , clomiphene citrate , Selective Estrogen Receptor Modulators , unless therapy least 4 week Serious psychiatric disease uncontrolled medical illness , suspect history clinical examination Used sex hormone steroidal anabolic drug supplement within 28 day screen testosterone collection Incapable give informed consent comply protocol
